originalText.text: We've worked with Sydney and her team for over 10+ years now and we can't recommend them highly enough. They make what can be a stressful situation - renting and selling of a home - into a smooth experience. Extremely informative about the process and steps we needed to take. Also very honest about what the market is and what is the best strategy.

text.text: We've worked with Sydney and her team for over 10+ years now and we can't recommend them highly enough. They make what can be a stressful situation - renting and selling of a home - into a smooth experience. Extremely informative about the process and steps we needed to take. Also very honest about what the market is and what is the best strategy.

originalText.text: Hiring Sydney Blumstein is the best decision you could make in your New York City real estate journey. I met Sydney when she helped me purchase my apartment in 2013. As a first time buyer from the West Coast, I needed a lot of hand holding. Not only did Sydney (and her entire amazing family) provide me with unmatched professional guidance gleaned from multi-generational experience as native NYC Village residents and real estate experts, her personal touch and genuine nature gave me complete confidence that my best interest was being prioritized - something that can be a challenge in the industry. It was therefore a no brainer to go back to Sydney when it was time to sell my apartment 10 years later. Once again, Sydney exercised skill, patience, deep knowledge of the unique NYC real estate ecosystem, and personal care, and secured a great sale for me. I feel incredibly lucky to know Sydney, her family, and her entire team. These are the people you want in your corner.

originalText.text: Sydney is wonderful to work with! She was friendly, professional, and was always thoughtful about sending listings my way that I might not have considered but actually turned out to be awesome. Work with Sydney!
